body:
S̜w͚a̎r̍m̸ is an live-sampling instrument. It was originally built for the singular purpose of capturing live instrument input and playing it back as a drone. Here, that idea is extended to include other sound possibilities.

<iframe width="100%" height="20" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" title="S̜w͚a̎r̍m̸" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/236603208&color=95bcda&inverse=false&auto_play=false&show_user=false"></iframe>

---

# Performances

* Littlefield Hall, Mills College, December 2, 2015
title: S̜w͚a̎r̍m̸  (2015)
